page.title: 03CLUBS
page.content: We decided to find out what clubs teenagers go to or would like to go to. Also whether teenagers go with their parents to clubs.To find this infomation we did a survey with a selection of teenagers in Ladywood. Around 52% of the teenagers attend some sort of club.The night which teenagers choose to go out is on a Friday.Some go two to three times a week to their clubs.Around half the teenagers go to their clubs with friends.The main clubs that teenagers would like to attend and most do attend are sports clubs and discoÂ£s.To cater for these demands,more schools are open during the week to the community and this year two of the biggest discoÂ£s in town started to have special nights for the 11-16 age group. Also in our area new sports facilities such as sailing and fishing clubs have opened recently.By E.Studley.T.Cronin.
